product_name: Altec Lansing HydraMotion 2.0 EverythingProof Wireless Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Light Gray Royal Blue, IMW1102-LGRYRYB
short_description: The HydraMotion 2.0 EverythingProof™ wireless speaker is packed with versatile features and offers powerful sound. With up to 12 hours of battery life, included speaker mount and carry strap, take your music anywhere! The HydraMotion 2.0 can handle the conditions of any adventure with its IP67 EverythingProof™ rating. Enhance your audio experience with HyperEdge LED light modes to brighten your sound. The HydraMotion 2.0 offers 2 Ways to Play as you can orient your speaker vertically or horizontally. Increase your sound with the Party Sync feature that allows you to pair 100+ HydraMotion 2.0s together. The party just got better with Altec Lansing!

product_name: Altec Lansing HydraMini 2.0 EverythingProof Magnetic Wireless Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Periwinkle Blue White, IMW1002-PERIWT
short_description: The Altec Lansing HydraMini 2.0 EverythingProof wireless portable bluetooth speaker is packed with features that will prepare you for every adventure! A 12-hour battery life allows you to keep the music going all day long, the included speaker mount, carabineer clip and built-in magnet allow you to #MOUNTIT, #CLIPIT or #STICKIT and securely attach your speaker almost anywhere. This little speaker packs a punch, featuring 8W RMS output power and 2" Neo full-range drivers, delivering rich, immersive sound with deep bass and crisp highs, additionally you can pair two HydraMini speakers together via stereo pairing for double the sound! The wireless bluetooth speaker boasts an IP67 waterproof rating, ensuring durability in water, sand, snow, and shocks, making it "everythingproof". It also floats, making it ideal for pool parties, kayaking and beach adventures, adding fun to all of your experiences.  The HydraMini 2.0 enjoys swift USB-C charging in 3 hours, so you are never without your tunes. Use voice assistant integration for hands-free control with Siri or Google Assistant. The Altec Lansing HydraMini 2.0 is the perfect, pocket-sized portable fun you need in a waterproof Bluetooth speaker!

product_name: Dual Electronics 7" Touchscreen Portable Dash Mount Car Stereo Receiver with Wireless Apple CarPlay & Android Auto – Bluetooth, USB – DMD7W (New)
short_description: The 7-inch LED high resolution touch screen display provides a comfortable viewing experience while keeping all your favorite content within fingers reach. CarPlay is the smarter and safer in-vehicle interface to operate your iPhone, and the experience is taken to another level when featured in the DMD7W. Simply talk to Siri or touch the receiver’s display and get directions from Apple Maps, make phone calls, listen to voicemail, send, and receive texts, and listen to music all in a way that allows you to stay focused on the road. New Condition.

short_description:
Click to Learn About Other Styles

Our team:

Since its inception, Mingdaln has focused on the field of smart wearable devices, committed to integrating cutting-edge technology with fashion design to create a high-quality and intelligent wearable experience for global consumers. We insist on providing users with products that combine fashion and technology, to meet the needs of different scenarios, so that smart wearable devices can truly integrate into and improve people's quality of life.


✔Stylish Design, Vibrant Display – The 46mm ultra-thin body hugs your wrist perfectly, while the 1.85-inch HD screen provides an expansive view with a 96% screen-to-body ratio. Paired with a lightweight strap for all-day comfort, it’s your perfect companion for business settings, workouts, and daily adventures.


✔Powerful Fitness Partners – Get Your Full Potential with Fitness Tracking, Gain Insights on Duration, Distance, Calories Burned and More, and Track More Than 120 Other Exercise Modes.


✔IP68 Waterproof – Rainy Runs, Sweat, and Splashes, One Watch Handles Daily Water Exposure, Meets Most Outdoor Training Needs, Lets You Enjoy All-Weather Sports and Life


✔Perfect Compatibility – Seamlessly Cooperates with Your Android/iPhone Device, Maintains Stable Links, and Supports Raising Your Wrist to Light Up or Snoop the Screen.


✔Stay in Touch – Answer/Make Calls, Listen to Music, Get Notifications During Your Trip.


✔Mingdaln - 12 months warranty – Choose brands that are committed to providing great products and exceptional customer service. Enjoy peace of mind with a 12-month warranty. short_description:
Yeego has long been committed to the essential needs of customers to develop and upgrade our products, we understand that beverage and wine storage refrigerators are different from traditional home preservation refrigerators, different wines need to be coarse storage at different temperatures in order to have the best taste, which Yeego firmly believe, but also the long-term focus of our products, and then it all boils down to refrigeration and temperature control. As we all know the key to refrigerator refrigeration depends on the compressor, Yeego's newly upgraded wine and beverage refrigerator series all use the latest technology compressor, as well as the most advanced temperature sensors and temperature sensing probes make the refrigerator smarter, more energy-efficient, more accurate, quieter, safer, more environmentally friendly, and longer service life.

product_name: Midea 6,000 BTU 115V Window Air Conditioner with Comfort Sense Remote, up to 250 Sq. ft., Black, MAW06R1WBL-T, New
short_description: Stay comfortable all summer long with the new Midea 6,000 BTU Window AC with Comfort Sense Control. Midea’s new Comfort Sense remote automatically adjusts the cooling strength based on the location of the remote! With three different cooling settings and three different fan speeds - there is no doubt you will find the setting that provides you with optimal comfort. You can select high, medium, or low - or use the energy saver button, designed to help you lower your energy bill. With the 24-hour timer you could set the timer, so your air conditioner turns on an hour before you get home! The Midea 6,000 BTU Window AC with Comfort Sense remote is ideal for cooling smaller spaces up to 250 square feet. The Midea 6,000 BTU Window AC with Comfort Sense also comes with a clean filter indicator button that lights up when it is time to remove and clean it. The Midea 6,000 BTU Window AC with Comfort Sense is designed to fit windows 23”-26” wide, and minimum height of 13”.
